channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Keep calm and carry on? It's been a miserable week for the UK, but it's not alone
item.description: A spike in long-term borrowing costs, concerns over the forthcoming Autumn Budget and political instability â€” it's just another normal week for the U....

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to quickly hear appeal to save his tariffs
item.description: The fate of most of President Trump's tariffs are at stake in the appeal, which seeks to overturn lower-court rulings finding he usurped Congress' aut...

item.title: Judge voids $2.2 billion Harvard funding freeze by Trump administration
item.description: The Trump administration in April froze grants to Harvard University over concerns about antisemitism on the Ivy League campus and other concerns.

item.title: Congress races to avoid government shutdown as partisan standoff deepens
item.description: Lawmakers returned to Capitol Hill this week with the threat of a government shutdown intensifying. Partisan fault lines are already solidified.

item.title: Ban on congressional stock ownership gains momentum with new bill
item.description: A ban on congressional stock trades is gaining momentum after a bipartisan group of lawmakers have unified around a single proposal.
